articles.description: Follow live text, in-play video clips and radio commentary as unbeaten South Africa play the winless Netherlands in the Men's Cricket World Cup 2023.
articles.title: World Cup: Unbeaten South Africa face winless Netherlands

articles.description: Euro 2024 qualifiers build-up as England face Italy and reaction as Belgium v Sweden abandoned after Brussels shooting.
articles.title: Football latest: Euro 2024 qualifiers reaction and build-up as England face Italy

articles.description: About 400 Sweden fans spend the night in hotels under police protection after two Swedish people are shot dead in Brussels.
articles.title: Sweden fans spend night under police protection

articles.description: England attack coach Richard Wigglesworth says South Africa have "evolved" since winning the Rugby World Cup in 2019.
articles.title: Are South Africa even better than 2019 Boks?

articles.description: Ivor Robson, the official starter at The Open for 41 years, introduced 18,995 players at the tournament in his distinctive Scottish accent.
articles.title: 'Voice of The Open' Robson dies aged 83

articles.description: Chris Sutton and Conor Coady think England fans should "keep opinions to themselves" after Jordan Henderson was booed when playing against Australia.
articles.title: 'Booing is not helping the England team'

articles.description: Scrum-half Ella Wyrwas will make her first start for England in the opening game of WXV1 against Australia on Friday in Wellington.
articles.title: Wyrwas makes first England start as WXV1 kicks off

articles.description: Meet Rudie van Vuuren, who in 2003 played in both the Rugby World Cup and Cricket World Cup.
articles.title: The doctor who played at World Cups in two sports

articles.description: Warrington's George Williams is named in the England squad to face Tonga in a three-match series despite being suspended for two of those games.
articles.title: Suspended Williams in England squad for Tonga Tests

articles.description: After former manager Roberto Mancini walked away, BBC Sport columnist Mina Rzouki asks: will new coach Luciano Spalletti reignite Italy against England?
articles.title: Luciano Spalletti - the man aiming to reignite the Azzurri
